places.name: Two Ten Jack
places.description: Great Japanese Food. Really good small plates with nice aesthetics. Good sushi and skewers.

places.name: Husk
places.description: Americana style food with Farm to Table execution.  Everything was excellent.

places.name: Chauhan
places.description: Great Indian food with an interesting vibe. The naan and chutney variety are excellent. Also the Korma and Masala are both great options.

places.name: Tansuo
places.description: Great Chinese food. Really good style. The Firecracker Wonton and General Tso's Chicken are especially good.
